description: Gets the Amazon Web Services Payment Cryptography key associated with the alias. Cross-account use: This operation can't be used across different Amazon Web Services accounts.

parameters.name: AliasName
parameters.description: The alias of the Amazon Web Services Payment Cryptography key.

nested_items.name: AliasName
nested_items.description: A friendly name that you can use to refer to a key. The value must begin with alias/.

nested_items.name: KeyArn
nested_items.description: The KeyARN of the key associated with the alias.
